moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Master Pakku
characters.description: teaches Aang and Katara Waterbending, very cool, very power, very water

moves.name: Hard Lesson to Learn
moves.description: Master Pakku gives his opponent a nice long lecture

moves.name: Tower of Ice
moves.description: Master Pakku elevates himself with a tower of ice and attacks his opponent from above

moves.name: Boil
moves.description: Master Pakku showers his opponent with boiling water

moves.name: Water Fist
moves.description: Master Pakku attacks his opponent with a giant water fist

new moves.name: Tower of Ice
new moves.description: Aang elevates himself with a tower of ice and attacks his opponent from above
